GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
RDMA/hfi1: fix potential memory leak in setup_base_ctxt()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 2f90813f1c21c3d780585390af961bd17c8515ae, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit e87473bc1b6c2cb08f1b760cfc8cd012822241a6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: RDMA/hfi1: fix potential memory leak in setup_base_ctxt()
